tasks.label: Docs: spell+lint+links
args: codespell --ignore-words .codespellignore .; markdownlint "**/*.md" -c .markdownlint.json --ignore-path .markdownlintignore; if (Get-Command lychee -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { lychee --config .github/lychee/lychee.toml . } else { Write-Host 'Lychee not installed' }
